alert.note: Alert for Custer; Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 2:49AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Loup, southwestern Garfield and northeastern Custer Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 248 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merna, or 8 miles northwest of Broken Bow, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burwell, Taylor, Sargent, Merna, Lillian, Round Valley, Homestead Knolls Campground, Walworth, Virginia Smith Dam, Big Oak Canyon, Divide Hill and Kent Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 108 and 124. Highway 2 between mile markers 266 and 274. Highway 92 near mile marker 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
